page.title: 13HOPPERS LANE
page.content: The area was used to excavate ballast for commercial use, resulting in excavations some 20ft. in depth. The owner of the site then applied for permission from the County Authority to use this area for the disposal of Toxic Waste Category F. Against vigorous local opposition, permission was granted for the first infill to ber made on the 31st July 1985. The Conditions of Disposal are;_ "Poisons to be in metal containers embedded in concrete and sunk 0.5m. in blue clay which comprises sub_soil in this area. This to be covered with fresh London Clay. A plan to be prepared showing the position of each container. Vent pipes to be inserted to allow for any escaping gas. Ultimately the site to be infilled with rubbish and soil and restored to agricultural use."
